pname.value: First Methodist Episcopal Church of Norwood

note.text: Personal information from Joel and Roberta Bromley
Foreman until Hoosier Iron Works closed

Married by a Methodist Episcopal clergyman, Jesse L. Corley, likely of First Methodist Episcopal Church of Norwood. The Methodist Episcopal Church was the largest Methodist denomination from 1784 to 1939, when it merged to found the Methodist Church. In the 1960s it merged to form the United Methodist Church.
Pulmonary edema due to emphysema. Living in the Oconto, Wisconsin, but taken to St. Mary's Hospital in Rochester, Minnesota.
